channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks and bonds haven’t moved together like this in three decades – and that’s putting portfolios at risk, says State Street
item.description: A so-called balanced portfolio is anything but given the correlation of stock and bond returns as well as concentration in stocks.

item.title: Will mortgage rates fall below 6% in 2025? Here’s what experts say.
item.description: The incoming Trump administration’s policies could affect mortgage rates in 2025, real-estate economists say.

item.title: Will home prices crash in 2025? Here’s what experts say.

item.title: What Trump's Views on Too-Big-To-Fail Mean for Your Bank Account
item.description: The president-elect disapproved of federal bailout for Silicon Valley Bank customers. That should be a warning for uninsured depositors at most banks.

item.title: Oil Prices Steady; OPEC+ Meeting in Focus

item.title: What Trump’s plan to end IRS ‘overstepping’ could mean for audits of rich people — and call hold times for everyone else
item.description: The incoming Trump team wants to change the IRS mentality from “we’re the tax police,” one expert said.
